content: धनुस् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [धन् शब्दे-उसि] Armed with a bow. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} A bow; धनुष्यमोघं समधत्त बाणं <ls>Ku. 3. 66</ls>; so इंद्रधनुः &c. (At the end of <ab>Bah.</ab> <ab>comp.</ab> धनुस् is changed to धन्वन्; <ls>R. 2. 8</ls>). {@--2@} A measure of length equal to four {%hastas%}; <ls>Y. 2. 167</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 237.</ls> {@--3@} An arc of a circle. {@--4@} The sign Sagittarius of the zodiac. {@--5@} A desert; <ab>cf.</ab> धन्वन्. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva.
